EmailTemplate.description: Use this template for students who can trial the new CaptureME ID card photo submission
EmailTemplate.name: CaptureMe ID card submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Trialing Monash's new online student ID card portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.First_Name_case_corrected__c},
We are excited at Monash to be trialing a new online ID card photo submission process. This is quick and easy and the hope is that this solution will make getting an ID card simpler. As this is a new process, you are an ideal candidate to trial this, and then we can post your ID card out to you.
All you will need is:
an existing online photo (or you can take a selfie) copy of photo identification, such as drivers licence or passport
You will need to go to http://monash.edu/photo-id
If you have been able to upload your photo, can you please reply to me so that I can process your card. Then I will send out your approved ID card.
If there is any other way in which I can be of assistance, please contact me by replying to this email or calling me at 1800 MONASH (666 274).
Kind regards
{!User.FirstName} {!User.Lastname_Initial__c}
Monash Connect Officer
{!User.Department}
{!User.CompanyName}
Tel: +61 3 9902 6011
